info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 24 at 5:25AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...BLIZZARD CONDITIONS WILL MAKE TRAVEL IMPOSSIBLE FOR PORTIONS OF THE NIAGARA FRONTIER EARLY THIS MORNING... HAZARDS...The combination of a band of heavy snow and winds gusting to 60 mph is producing BLIZZARD conditions. Visibility within the band is ZERO. There are numerous vehicles stranded on the roadways. DO NOT attempt to travel in this band. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 520 AM EST, a 15 mile wide band extends from Buffalo to Grand Island northeast across the Northtowns and into far northwest Genesee and western portions of Orleans counties. This band is expected to remain nearly stationary or drift a few miles north through 730 AM. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Buffalo, Cheektowaga, North Tonawanda, Lockport, Kenmore, Tonawanda, Amherst, Medina, Albion, Williamsville, Grand Island, Pendleton, Erie Basin Marina, Middleport, Sanborn, Ridgeway, Shelby, Alabama, Lyndonville and Clarence Center. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 50 and 51. SAFETY INFO... Travel is nearly impossible in this area with blizzard conditions. &&
